# Usage

`survSAKK` provides Publication-Ready Kaplan-Meier plot. The objective is provide an user-friendly and flexible `R` package, which will incorporate various statistics and layout customisation options to enhance the efficiency and adaptability of the Kaplan-Meier plot. 


# Install the package

```{r}
devtools::install_github(
  repo = "https://github.com/SAKK-Statistics/survSAKK",
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

# Load package

```{r}
libray(survSAKK)
```

# Get the documentation of a function 

```{r}
help(package = "survSAKK")
```

# Acess vignette

```{r}
vignette("surv.plot")
```
